alert.note: Alert for Gadsden (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN GADSDEN... SOUTHEASTERN DECATUR AND SOUTHERN GRADY COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 532 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cairo to near Havana. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Cairo, Bainbridge, Whigham, Greensboro, Gretna, Attapulgus, Climax, Littman, Juniper, Douglas City, Capel, Rosedale, Jamieson, Laingkat, Calvary, Santa Clara, Amsterdam, Quincy Airport, and Branchville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
